pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, January 31, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, January 31, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.


2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

5:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Canada-China Legislative Association Chinese New Year reception and will deliver brief remarks.

Room 160-S, Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and pooled coverage of remarks
